recipes.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
recipes.description: A vibrant, nutritious bowl packed with Mediterranean flavors and fresh ingredients.
instructions: Rinse quinoa and cook according to package directions
Heat olive oil in a large pan and saut√© garlic and onions
Add bell peppers and cook for 5 minutes
Add spinach and tomatoes, cook until spinach wilts
Serve over cooked quinoa and drizzle with extra olive oil

recipes.name: Herb-Crusted Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
recipes.description: Perfectly seasoned salmon with a crispy herb crust, served with colorful roasted vegetables.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425¬∞F (220¬∞C)
Cut sweet potatoes and broccoli into bite-sized pieces
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper
Season salmon with herbs, garlic, and lemon zest
Roast vegetables for 15 minutes, then add salmon to the pan
Cook for another 12-15 minutes until salmon flakes easily

recipes.name: Spicy Tofu and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry with crispy tofu and fresh vegetables in a savory sauce.
instructions: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cube
Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat
Stir-fry tofu until golden and crispy, remove and set aside
Add vegetables to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Return tofu to pan, add sauce and toss to combine
Serve immediately over brown rice

recipes.name: Greek Chicken Power Bowl
recipes.description: A protein-packed bowl with marinated chicken, fresh vegetables, and Greek flavors.
instructions: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs for 30 minutes
Cook quinoa according to package directions
Grill or pan-sear chicken until cooked through
Prepare fresh vegetables and arrange in bowls
Slice chicken and place over quinoa and vegetables
Serve with a dollop of Greek yogurt

recipes.name: Veggie-Loaded Garden Omelet
recipes.description: A fluffy omelet packed with fresh vegetables and herbs for a nutritious breakfast or lunch.
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Saut√© onions and bell peppers until soft
Add spinach and tomatoes, cook until spinach wilts
Pour beaten eggs over vegetables
Fold omelet in half when eggs are set and serve immediately

recipes.name: Keto Avocado Power Bowl
recipes.description: A rich, satisfying keto-friendly bowl with healthy fats and minimal carbs.
instructions: Halve and pit avocados, scoop out some flesh to create wells
Crack an egg into each avocado half
Bake at 375¬∞F for 15-20 minutes until egg whites are set
Saut√© spinach with olive oil and garlic
Serve avocados over spinach, topped with crushed almonds

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry Bowl
recipes.description: A fragrant and spicy Thai curry with vegetables and your choice of protein.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package directions
Heat coconut oil in a large pan
Saut√© onions and garlic until fragrant
Add curry paste and cook for 1 minute
Add vegetables and coconut milk, simmer for 15 minutes
Serve over brown rice with fresh herbs

recipes.name: Protein-Packed Berry Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: A thick, creamy smoothie bowl topped with nuts, seeds, and fresh fruit.
instructions: Blend frozen berries with Greek yogurt and protein powder
Pour into a bowl and smooth the top
Top with sliced almonds and chia seeds
Add fresh berries and a drizzle of honey if desired
Serve immediately for best texture
